page.title: 12A SCHOOL DAY,DENESIDE,SEAHAM
page.content: THE MORNING USUALLY BEGINS WITH WORSHIP,ALL THE CHILDREN BEING TOGETHER IN THE SCHOOL HALL.TEACHERS MUST COMPLETE THE ATTENDANCE AND DINNER REGISTERS FOR THE DAY.MORNINGS ARE USUALLY TAKEN UP WITH MATHS, ENGLISH AND READING.IN OTHER LESSONS WE LEARN ABOUT OUR HISTORY AND OUR WORLD.WE OFTEN DO SCIENCE EXPERIMENTS. A TELEVISION PROGRAMME OFTEN HELPS US WITH OUR WORK AND WE ALL HAVE TIME ON THE SCHOOL COMPUTER,A B.B.C.MICRO.WE OFTEN GO TO THE HALL FOR SINGING AND REGULARLY PERFORM AN END OF TERM CONCERT FOR THE PARENTS,ESPECIALLY AT CHRISTMAS.THERE ARE MANY ACTIVITIES AFTER SCHOOL.WE HAVE FOOTBALL,NETBALL, AND SWIMMING TEAMS.THERE ARE OFTEN CHILDREN STAYING BEHIND TO DO DRAMA WORK OR GYMNASTICS.SUMMER IS A TIME WHEN CLASSES OFTEN GO OUT OF SCHOOL FOR LESSONS,FIELD WORK OR TRIPS.
